misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a celebrated figure from Keimola Golf, has marked his presence in the Hector Trophée with distinction. Known for his dedication to the sport, Timo's involvement extends beyond the greens, notably as an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting, influencing many with his expertise and insights.

With 8 appearances in past Hector Trophée events, Timo has demonstrated great commitment to the competition. His efforts have culminated in securing the coveted Hector Trophée on 3 occasions, showcasing great skill and teamwork. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his impact on the tournament remains undeniable.

Although Timo is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his legacy endures, and the possibility of a future return remains open. His contributions to golf, both on and off the course, continue to inspire players and enthusiasts alike.
